quote: Xcuse me, I found something under my shoes. Oh its your attitude.
author: Attitude

quote: When i was born..Devil said..?Oh Shit..!! Competition?
author: Attitude

quote: I enjoy when people show Attitude to me because it shows that they need an Attitude to impress me!
author: Attitude

quote: Not always available, try your luck ;)
author: Attitude

quote: There is no market for YOUR EMOTIONS, so never advertise your FEELINGS just display YOUR ATTITUDE.,.
author: Attitude

quote: People say me bad, trust me i am the worst!!!
author: Attitude

quote: Smile in front of people who hate you Ur happiness kills them
author: Attitude

quote: Someone Asked me what is UR attitude then i simply replied ? BEING SINGLE IS MY ATTITUDE
author: Attitude

quote: Stop checking my status ! Go Get A Life :P
author: Attitude

quote: Dont Copy My Style.
author: Attitude

quote: I am who I am, Your approval is not needed
author: Attitude

quote: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
author: Shawn Ashmore

quote: All things are ready if our mind be so.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Keep moving! Nothing new to read
author: Attitude

quote: My life,My rules My Attitude!!!
author: Attitude

quote: You create beauty with your attitude, your behaviours, and your actions. Its all up to you
author: Attitude

quote: Two fundamentals of cool life  Walk like you are the king OR walk like you dont care ,who is the king.
author: Attitude

quote: Im sorry my fault. I forgot youre an Idiot.
author: Attitude

quote: May my enemies live a long life to see my success.
author: Attitude

quote: i am what i am.. i will never try to be some one else.
author: Attitude

quote: God is really creative, I mean ...just look at me !
author: Attitude

quote: Free your heart from any hatred. Free your mind from any worries. Live simply. Give more. Expect less.
author: Attitude

quote: I Am Not Special , I Am Just Limited Edition :P
author: Attitude

quote: Phones are better than girlfriends, At least we can switch off.
author: Attitude

quote: When I drink alcohol Everyone says Im alcoholic. But When I drink Fanta.. No one says Im fantastic!!!
author: Attitude

quote: Do not judge by appearances; a rich heart may be under a poor coat.
author: Scottish Proverbs

quote: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: If i had a gun with two bullets and i was with hitler,bin laden and you insert your ex or your enemys name],i would shoot you twice.
author: Attitude

quote: Born with winner Qualitys
author: Attitude

quote:
All Birds find shelter during a rain.
But Eagle avoids rain by flying above
the Clouds.

Problems are common, but attitude
makes the difference!!!
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If you think your opinion of me has any effect, Honey let me assure you that none of my self worth is wrapped up in what you think of me.
author: Attitude

quote: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: My attitude depends on the people in front of me.
author: Attitude

quote: Coolness and absence of heat and haste indicate fine qualities.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is skin deep but attitude is to the bone
author: Attitude

quote: If I delete your number, youre basically deleted from my life.
author: Attitude

quote: Dont hate me, just get to know me first!
author: Attitude

quote: Your whatsapp status says online ..If your online then why arent you texting me!!!
author: Attitude

quote: I am single because God is busy writing the best love story for me
author: Attitude

quote: The biggest slap to your enemies is your success!!!!
author: Attitude

quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: I hate when people look at my phone while Im typing. Its not that I have something to hide... Its just none of their damn business :/
author: Attitude

quote: I smile ...Because I dont know WHAT THE HELL is going on.
author: Attitude

quote: When everything comes your way.. Then you are on the wrong way.
author: Attitude

quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
author: Colin Powell

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength
author: Michael Jordan

quote: When you think there is nothing left in your life,just keep working hard until you die :)
author: Attitude

quote: Error: status unavailable
author: Attitude

quote: Hence, within the space of two generations there has been a complete revolution in the attitude of the trades-unions toward the women working in their trades.
author: Florence Kelley

quote: The reactionary is always willing to take a progressive attitude on any issue that is dead.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I am not failed, my success is just postponed.
author: Attitude

quote: I talk to myself because i like dealing with a better class of people.
author: Savielly Tartakower

quote: Whether a glass is half full or half empty depends on the attitude of the person looking at it.
author: Source Unknown

quote: Dear Mario..I Wasted My Childhood Trying To Save Your Girlfriend.Now, you help me to save mine.
author: Attitude

quote: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.
author: William James

quote: In War: Resolution. In Defeat: Defiance. In Victory: Magnanimity. In Peace: Goodwill.
author: Sir Winston Churchill

quote: If you believe in yourself, have dedication, pride, and that never quit attitude, you will be a winner
author: Attitude

quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Bad attitudes will ruin your team.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: Dont be happy.I dont Really forgive people,I just pretend like its ok and wait for my turn to destroy them.
author: Attitude

quote: I need that aggressive attitude to play my music and more men have that attitude than women.
author: Lita Ford

quote: Zeal is a volcano, the peak of which the grass of indecisiveness does not grow.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: You can complain because roses have thorns, or you can rejoice because thorns have roses.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: If you eat something and get fat, you should be responsible for it. I think that is the attitude of the great majority of Americans, that you should be responsible for what you eat.
author: Vic Snyder

quote: To different minds, the same world is a hell, and a heaven.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Irritation in the heart of a believer is always an invitation to the devil to stand by.
author: Source Unknown

quote: I tried to be normal. Worst two minutes of my life.
author: Attitude

quote: At the most one could say that his chi or  ...  personal god was good. But the Ibo people have a proverb that when a man says yes his chi says yes also.  Okonkwo said yes very strongly so his chi agreed.
author: Chinua Achebe

quote: Two things define you, your patience when you have nothing, and your attitude when you have everything
author: Attitude

quote: Attitudes are the forerunners of conditions.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: What happens is not as important as how you react to what happens.
author: Thaddeus Golas

quote: Always ignore hateful attitude and rude behavior of the people. They are powerless without your response.
author: Bushra Zarrar Rana

quote: Definition of EX: Thanks for the EXperience. Our time has EXpired. Now EXit my life.
author: Attitude

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: A slip of the foot you may soon recover, but a slip of the tongue you may never get over.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You will find a girl prettier than me, smarter than me, and funnier than me, but you will never find a girl just like me.
author: Attitude

quote: A bad attitude is like a flat tire. You cant go anywhere until you change it
author: Attitude

quote: I dont need to explain myself, I know Im right.
author: Attitude

quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Status under construction of life.
author: Attitude

quote: Someone asked me what is UR attitude
author: Attitude

quote: If you love someone set them free. If they come back, set them on fire.. ;) :D
author: Attitude

quote: Im not SHORT, I am just concentrated AWESOME !
author: Attitude

quote: I am not as dumb as you look!!!
author: Attitude

quote: Dont PLAY with Me ! Coz i know I Can PLAY Better Than You.
author: Attitude

quote: Take charge of your attitude. Dont let someone else choose it for you
author: Attitude

quote: All things are subjective, a persons circumstances has nothing to do with current or past events, but rather their perception of those events, and the attitude and manner in which they choose to approach it
author: Attitude

quote: I dont change , i just grew up. You should try it once ;)
author: Attitude

quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The purely agitational attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: If you dont control your attitude, then it will control you
author: Attitude

quote: No one ever got rich with a poor attitude
author: Attitude

quote: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.
author: Marjory Stoneman Douglas

quote: Life always has many things to bring you down. But, what can really bring you down is your attitude
author: Attitude

quote: The world is a looking glass and gives back to every man the reflection of his own face.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Were all blessed and were all blighted Chief Inspector said Finney. Everyday each of us does our sums. The question is what do we count
author: Louise Penny

quote: There is very little difference in people but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Your attitude is an expression of your values, beliefs and expectations
author: Attitude

quote: You will find a girl prettier than me, smarter than me, and funnier than me, but you will never find a girl just like me.
author: Attitude

quote: A bad attitude is like a flat tire. You cant go anywhere until you change it
author: Attitude

quote: I dont need to explain myself, I know Im right.
author: Attitude

quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Status under construction of life.
author: Attitude

quote: Someone asked me what is UR attitude
author: Attitude

quote: If you love someone set them free. If they come back, set them on fire.. ;) :D
author: Attitude

quote: Im not SHORT, I am just concentrated AWESOME !
author: Attitude

quote: I am not as dumb as you look!!!
author: Attitude

quote: Dont PLAY with Me ! Coz i know I Can PLAY Better Than You.
author: Attitude

quote: Take charge of your attitude. Dont let someone else choose it for you
author: Attitude

quote: All things are subjective, a persons circumstances has nothing to do with current or past events, but rather their perception of those events, and the attitude and manner in which they choose to approach it
author: Attitude

quote: I dont change , i just grew up. You should try it once ;)
author: Attitude

quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The purely agitational attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: If you dont control your attitude, then it will control you
author: Attitude

quote: No one ever got rich with a poor attitude
author: Attitude

quote: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.
author: Marjory Stoneman Douglas

quote: Life always has many things to bring you down. But, what can really bring you down is your attitude
author: Attitude

quote: The world is a looking glass and gives back to every man the reflection of his own face.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Were all blessed and were all blighted Chief Inspector said Finney. Everyday each of us does our sums. The question is what do we count
author: Louise Penny

quote: There is very little difference in people but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Your attitude is an expression of your values, beliefs and expectations
author: Attitude

quote: We all are born to die dont feel more special than me.
author: Attitude
